segments.text: Man , that sunset is beautiful . I ’ Ve never seen one so red .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , it ’ s pretty nice , but its so red because of air pollution .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , the smog from all these cars gets into the air and turns the sunlight red .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , more people need to take public transportation or carpool .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we ’ Ve already done our part .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , it ’ s your turn to drive next week . Don ’ t be late picking me up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t worry . I ’ m getting more sleep these days . The baby ’ s finally growing up a little more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , give me a call if you can ’ t make it for some reason .
segments.speaker: S2
